```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

1. Click "Project (None)" in the upper-right of RStudio and 
choose "New Project":

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[height=2in]{ss1.png}
\end{center}

\bigskip

2. Select "New Directory" or "Existing Directory" as appropriate
(I selected "New Directory" for this demo)

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[height=4in]{ss2.png}
\end{center}

\clearpage

3. For the "Project Type" choose "New Project"

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[height=4in]{ss3.png}
\end{center}

\bigskip

4. Choose a directory name and click "Create Project"

\begin{center}
\includegraphics[height=4in]{ss4.png}
\end{center}

\bigskip
